description: Enhanced compliance manifest with business context mappings and risk intelligence

metadata.risk_scoring_methodology: Based on enforcement frequency, penalty severity, and implementation complexity
metadata.automation_scoring_methodology: 0-1 scale based on availability of APIs, clear rules, and measurability
